product_name: NeutrogenaHydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Water Gel Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackQuench dry skin with this oil-free & non-comedogenic Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, the moisturizer for dry skin absorbs quickly without clogging pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsAward-winning and best selling water gel formula to deliver intense hydrationInstantly hydrates and quenches dry skin, leaving it looking smooth and suppleOil-free formula allows you to wear it alone or under makeup as a smooth velvety primerNon-comedogenic face moisturizing cream from a Dermatologist-Recommended brandProvides long-lasting moisture to keep skin looking smooth, supple, and hydrated day after dayFormulated WithoutOilItem 2284291How To UseApply evenly to face and neck after cleansing.IngredientsWater, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylamide, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Dimethiconol, C13-14 Isoparafin, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Chlorphenesin, Carbomer, Laureth-7, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance, C12-14 Pareth-12, Sodium Hydroxide, Blue 1.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to face and neck after cleansing.

reviews.headline: My favvv of all time
reviews.comments: This is my go to moisturizer, i usually get free sample from other moisturizer but this is my fav all time and wouldn't trade it for anything. It's so light and refreshing

reviews.headline: Not for the acne sensitive girlies
reviews.comments: If this weren't colored or scented I would use it but it's so bad if you have acne or sensitive skin. I used it once and I haven't touched it since

reviews.headline: Been using for a few years.
reviews.comments: Love how it makes my skin feel & look hydrated & softer.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT!!!
reviews.comments: I have very oily skin and this has helped me so much!! I had been looking for a long time and this works well for me. It keeps my skin balanced all day.

reviews.headline: This Did Not Work
reviews.comments: Sadly this product did not work for me at all. I was hoping to use it to replace a different more expensive product, but it was a mistake. I didnt care for the smell much either. But after only three days of using it I got super bad acne. Both cystic and white heads. Sadly it was just not for me, despite the texture feeling nice on my face.

reviews.headline: Great but stinks
reviews.comments: If you can deal with way too much fragrance that smells like dryer sheet then you'll love the product. It works great but it STINKS. I tried it a few times because it made my skin look good but couldn't get past the headaches from the smell

reviews.headline: Great but stinks
reviews.comments: If you can deal with way too much fragrance that smells like dryer sheet then you'll love the product. It works great but it STINKS. I tried it a few times because it made my skin look good but couldn't get past the headaches from the smell

reviews.headline: Great product, but…
reviews.comments: Super hydrating and smooth medium consistency. Melts into face pretty well, more of a nighttime product or winter routine for parched skin. Have to use sparingly when applying makeup. Only annoyance is the price always changes! Compare online first.

reviews.headline: NOT GOOD for acne-prone skin.
reviews.comments: This moisturizer has fragrance in it, which SEVERELY irritated my sensitive and acne-prone skin. Immediately after trying this moisturizer, my skin became congested with an increase in texture, blemishes, and cysts. I really wanted to like this, but I threw it away and will NOT buy again. Switching back to Cerave cleared my skin.

reviews.headline: Disappointing
reviews.comments:
Was not a fan at all. Heard such great things from influencers (shouldve known better) and dermatologists as well. SMH. 
1st red flag- wayyyy too fragrant. 
Gave my skin like a tingly sensation and not in a good way. It does have a nice, airy texture but was not giving anything else. I thought maybe it was just me plus i didnt want to just waste it so i let my daughter try it out as she is starting to get in her skincare ErA. Left her skin burning and was visibly red after one use. Unfortunately, i had to throw away. I love Neutrogena so i really expected better. I still think theyre a good brand.

reviews.headline: This is my go to moisturizer
reviews.comments: I've tried many different moisturizers but none are as good as this moisturizer. My skin rarely feels dry. It is lightweight and contains hyalauronic acid which I like.

reviews.headline: BURNS MY SKIN!!
reviews.comments: It has fragrances and when i put it on. Oh my god. My entire face became red! DO NOT RECCOMEND :(

reviews.headline: BURNS MY SKIN!!
reviews.comments: It has fragrances and when i put it on. Oh my god. My entire face became red! DO NOT RECCOMEND :(

reviews.headline: Don't buy
reviews.comments: This makes me breakout soo bad. and its just not moisturizing. The product is a weird consistency - it ends up just sitting on your face and dries up. my skin ends up dry within the hour.

reviews.headline: Very good moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I have used this product for 2ish years. I use it as a night moisturizer, and it keeps my normal-combo skin hydrated all night long! This product does not break me out, moisturizes well, leaves my skin feeling smooth, has a cooling effect immediately upon application, and has a very smooth and lightweight texture/feel. However, on nights when I use my benzoyl peroxide + adalpalene topical cream, the moisturizer stings my face and lacks moisturizing benefits (most likely because of the fragrance and effects of spot treatment). I overall love this product, I just wish it didn't have fragrance (does smell really good though)! Will continue to buy, as it has really helped with my acne!

reviews.headline: Why would this burn
reviews.comments: I got this along with micellar water and thry both smell like a dirty dish rag and burn my fave so bad

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is a staple in both mine and my husband's skincare routines (we both have combo, sensitive, acne-prone skin) I would say it feels a bit pricey nowadays, but it lasts us about 2 months (using in the AM & PM). Plus, the brand has frequent sales!

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is a staple in both mine and my husband's skincare routines (we both have combo, sensitive, acne-prone skin) I would say it feels a bit pricey nowadays, but it lasts us about 2 months (using in the AM & PM). Plus, the brand has frequent sales!

reviews.headline: Fragrance not needed
reviews.comments: Although I like the feel of this moisturizer on my skin, it does sting and I don't know why.  Perhaps it's the fragrance that's been added?

reviews.headline: 5-star for oily skin
reviews.comments: I have very dry but VERY oily skin at the same time & this worked like a dream!! So many water gel moisturizers I have tried do nothing and feel greasy. This on the other hand, smoothed my texture, made my skin look bouncy, absorbed into my skin very well and made my base for my makeup smooth. I definitely recommend this but keep in mind this does have silicone if you are using this w/ makeup. I suggest silicone-based makeup products for this moisturizer!

I'm on my THIRD container it's that good!

Best moisturizer I have ever used

faceoff_positive.comments: I have normal to combo skin. When I was younger I would break out in hormonal cysts on my chin that would last for months. Scarring is an issue. This product works so well to hydrate my skin. I can instantly see the difference, my skin just drinks this up.  Perfectly absorbs instantly so my foundation goes on and stays on... doesn't melt off because this product is non greasy yet works all day and night until you wash it off. This is truly a product that I have and will continue to recommend. I am in my mid 40's with signs of aging. Deep wrinkles under my eyes and around my mouth. I have considered using botox and fillers but once I apply this Moisturizer gel into my skin the idea to go and to pay someone to stick needles with expensive ingredients in my face tends to cease. Put this morning and night and watch the compliments roll in... Take a selfie of a before and after and see what I mean. I would become a brand ambassador solely on my experience with this product... but I use many others of theirs too. And I am very, very happy with the results. I will not use any other moisturizer after this... the price is perfect but even more so is that it works. My skin is plump, dewy and hydrated. I look a lot younger and when my skin is leached of moisture from sun exposure or just overwork or stress. This gel is my go to miracle to help me feel like money and time well spent. Thank you.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best moisturizer I have ever used

faceoff_negative.comments: I used this product for two months morning and night. While I was using this product I started to get terrible acne. Cystic and large white heads all over my cheeks, chin, and sometimes forehead. I had acne as a teenager(I'm 23) so I thought I was just having a reoccurring stint, until I ran out of the gel and didn't have time to buy more.  My skin started to clear up in a week in a half. I had no idea it was wrecking my skin. I looked up reviews after I noticed a difference and other users had the same problem. I hoped the gel would not create acne, but it did not work. Do not recommend.
faceoff_negative.headline: Gave me awful breakouts
